- Location: Ceiling HVAC vent in interior living area (adjacent to doorway/lamp visible in background).
- Material: White metal/louvered vent cover; two screws securing frame.
- Condition: Grille appears flush and undamaged; no visible rust or bent slats; minimal dust.
- Ceiling/surroundings: White textured ceiling (popcorn/knockdown finish) around vent; trim edge intact.
- Recommendation: No maintenance issues observed; routine dusting as needed.
